name: Without you... I can't become King of the Pirates!!!!
text: [Counter] Give your Leader or up to one of your Characters +1000 power for this battle. Then, if your life total is 1 or less, play up to one yellow cost 5 or lower {Straw Hat Crew} type or "Sanji" Character from your hand.
